title: Rajsi Jadau Jhumkas: Emerald Splendor with Pearl Drops
materials: Cultured Pearls. Crafted with traditional Hyderabadi Polish for a rich
features: Intricate Jadau setting showcasing the vibrant Emeralds. The design incorporates delicate floral motifs, reminiscent of Mughal artistry, with pearl drops adding a touch of classic South Indian elegance. Features an antique finish, highlighting the exquisite detailing and depth of the craftsmanship.
colors: and Creamy White Pearls create a regal and timeless color palette.
occasions: and special occasions where you want to make a statement of refined elegance. Ideal for pairing with traditional silk sarees or modern Indo-Western attire.
description: These Jadau Jhumkas are a testament to enduring craftsmanship and timeless design. The exquisite Emeralds symbolize prosperity and good fortune, while the pearls represent purity and wisdom. A true heirloom piece to be cherished for generations. Features the traditional Jadau setting, a labor-intensive technique perfected over centuries. The unique combination of vibrant Emeralds and lustrous Pearls sets it apart from ordinary jewelry.
